mapper.sql: cid, cname, tid, cnum, cdescribe, ccolor, cmodel, cnew, cpic, cprice, uid, caddress, cphone, cpostage, cup_date, cdown_date, cstate_com, cstate_dingdan, cavg_grade, cbargain

select
distinct
from commodities
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into commodities (cid, cname, tid, cnum, cdescribe, ccolor, cmodel, cnew, cpic, cprice, uid, caddress, cphone, cpostage, cup_date, cdown_date, cstate_com, cstate_dingdan, cavg_grade, cbargain) values (#{cid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cdescribe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ccolor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cmodel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cnew,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cpic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{caddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cpostage,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cupDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{cdownDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{cstateCom,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cstateDingdan,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cavgGrade,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cbargain,jdbcType=CHAR})
